title: Angular Library Options Schema
description: Creates a new generic Library definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the Library?

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated library.

path.description: The path at which to create the library files, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the service in the project root.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new library.
